mapper.select: select c.code_nm , tlpi.li_cd , tlpi.stdr_ym , tlpi.all_popltn_cnt , tlpi.male_popltn_cnt , tlpi.female_popltn_cnt from ( select li_cd , stdr_ym , all_popltn_cnt , male_popltn_cnt , female_popltn_cnt from tgd_li_popltn_info where li_cd like #{liCd} || '%' and stdr_ym = #{stdrYm} ) tlpi inner join comtccmmndetailcode c on (c.code = tlpi.li_cd and c.code_id = 'YPLI')

select st_astext(st_centroid(st_union(geom))) as geom from tgd_li_popltn_info where 1=1
and stdr_ym = #{stdrYm}
and stdr_ym = (select max(stdr_ym) from tgd_li_popltn_info)
and li_cd like '4183025%'
and li_cd like concat(substring(#{liCd},1,8),'%')

select c2.code_nm , sum(tgpi.all_popltn_cnt) all_popltn_cnt , sum(tgpi.male_popltn_cnt) male_popltn_cnt , sum(tgpi.female_popltn_cnt) female_popltn_cnt from ( select grid_id , li_cd , stdr_ym , all_popltn_cnt , male_popltn_cnt , female_popltn_cnt from tgd_grid_popltn_info ) tgpi inner join comtccmmndetailcode c2 on (tgpi.li_cd like (substring(c2.code, 1, 8) || '%') and c2.code_id = 'YPE001') group by c2.code_nm

select c.code_nm , tgpi.grid_id , tgpi.li_cd , tgpi.stdr_ym , tgpi.all_popltn_cnt , tgpi.male_popltn_cnt , tgpi.female_popltn_cnt from ( select grid_id , li_cd , stdr_ym , all_popltn_cnt , male_popltn_cnt , female_popltn_cnt from tgd_grid_popltn_info tgpi where 1 = 1
and li_cd like '41830%'
and li_cd like #{liCd} || '%'
and stdr_ym = #{stdrYm} ) tgpi inner join comtccmmndetailcode c on (c.code = tgpi.li_cd and c.code_id = 'YPLI')
